subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Kristin's Files/Frank said Practice.wav 
  Uploaded by : nitsirk65 <ckmorris95@...> 
  Description : I ran this through the cleaner to see if it would sound better.. but I asked how I could make communication stronger and guess what I was told??  FRANK SAID PRACTICE!  Seriously Frank you can talk to me direct (;-) .  Anyway I hope you can hear this one too...  

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Kristin%27s%20Files/Frank%20said%20Practice.wav 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

nitsirk65 <ckmorris95@...>
